chat_short/long: a short or long response to a question. Default to short unless requested to.
standby: ends the current conversation but doesn't end the program.
sleep: ends the conversation by killing the script.
unknown: the request does not match any categories. Include hallucinations of the speech-to-text model or nonsensicle phrases such as 'Thank you for watching!' 'Alright, that's all.' or 'You'
